books.title: To Kill a Mockingbird
books.summary: A story of a young girl confronting the harsh realities of social inequality and racial injustice.
A chilling portrayal of how a society dominated by a totalitarian government gives rise to a culture of fear and paranoia.

books.title: Brave New World
books.summary: A grim dystopian view of a future society where life is pain-free but meaningless.
